title: Burning of Westfold (4R144)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: If you control a site, play an Uruk-hai to discard a Free Peoples condition.
